video.title: Una Familia de Diez
video.synopsis: Though they're all crammed into a tiny home, the 10 members of the Lopez clan manage to share lots of laughs as they stumble through life's mishaps.

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco López is anxious about having too many family members in a small apartment. However, he doesn't even know his son just got married.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Plutarco and Gaby are married and are expecting a child soon. Meanwhile, Placido's boss threatens to fire him if his daughter doesn't return in a day.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Plácido begs for money so his daughter Martina can attend school. Meanwhile, Plutarco and Gaby go to the roof in search of privacy.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The López family has had all their utilities turned off. Luckily, Plácido gets his job back and Plutarco also finds a work connection.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: There's no end in sight for Plácido's family conflicts. When Plutarco's father stops up the toilet with tamale leaves, he asks his son to unblock it.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The López family is stealing cable TV service. A cable company inspector comes calling and they're forced to sign a 2-year contract.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Grandfather Arnoldo comes home from his check-up with news that he only has a few days to live. But it turns out to be a mistake.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Grandfather Arnoldo disappears after the family learns that his illness was misdiagnosed. Meanwhile, Gaby's father finds out about her pregnancy.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Gaby's father demands that she and Plutarco be married by law. But they have way too many differences between them.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Gaby tries on a wedding dress that her mother-in-law offers her. Plácido's boss invites the president as witness. Plutarco loses the rings.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: After five years, La Nena is visited by her father, Carlos, who is depressed over his lost love and plans to stay for a few days.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Martina lies to her friend Ricky and says she's rich, pretending her family are her servants. He is outraged when he finds out the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: While they are trying to fix the TV signal, a lighting bolt strikes the building, causing the family members' personalities to change.
episodes.title: Episode 13
